section.heading: Quarterly report.
section.text: The Mayor shall transmit to the Council within 30 days after the end of each quarter a report containing the following information:

para.text: A list of the properties acquired during the quarter to be disposed of pursuant to this subchapter;
A list of the properties disposed of pursuant to this subchapter during the quarter;
A copy of each RFP issued during the quarter;
A copy of each winning proposal selected during the quarter;
A copy of each disposition agreement entered into during the quarter;
A cumulative list of each property disposed of pursuant to this subchapter including:
The status of the rehabilitation of the property;
Whether the developer has resold or rented the property;
A list of the properties sold or rented as affordable to households earning 60% or less of area median income, that specifies the percentage of area median income earned by the household; and

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 16-119 rewrote par. (6), which had read as follows: “(6) A cumulative list of each property disposed of pursuant to this subchapter, the status of the rehabilitation of the property, and whether the developer has resold the property for residential occupancy; and”

For temporary (225 day) addition, see § 9 of Abandoned and Vacant Properties Community Development Disposition, and Disapproval of Disposition of Certain Scattered Vacant and Abandoned Properties Temporary of 2002 (D.C. Law 14-203, October 17, 2002, law notification 49 DCR 10021).
